DOC.brief_summary: CBOCs represent one VA 's main manage care strategy shift focus care inpatient outpatient set improve health nation 's veteran . Hypothesis-driven research critically need test basic assumption motivate expansion CBOCs throughout VA health care system .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Service Delivery Through Access Points
DOC.detailed_description: Background : CBOCs represent one VA 's main manage care strategy shift focus care inpatient outpatient set improve health nation 's veteran . Hypothesis-driven research critically need test basic assumption motivate expansion CBOCs throughout VA health care system . Objectives : The purpose determine increase geographic access primary care service affect service use cost . Two specific aim address : 1 ) determine CBOCs impact service use exist user exist user follow ambulatory care sensitive condition ( ACSC ) : alcohol dependence , angina , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , depression , diabetes hypertension ; 2 ) describe CBOCs affect workload cost VA health care system VISN 's perspective . Methods : A quasi-experimental pre-post study design intervention reference group employ compare service use cost 18 month follow establishment new CBOC . Fifteen CBOCs 11 VISNs include analysis . For specific aim 1 , intervention group define exist user catchment area new CBOC reference group define match exist user outside CBOC catchment area . Multivariate statistical regression analysis use estimate impact reside within CBOC catchment area use cost post-period , control patient casemix use/cost 18 month pre-period . For specific aim 2 , intervention group define zip code catchment area new CBOC reference group define match zip code outside CBOC catchment area . Average use cost user , exist user new user intervention zip code reference zip code compare . Status : Complete .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must live catchment area specify CBOC diagnose tracer condition .
